title: UGH THIS CLIENT DRIVE ME CRAZY !!!
body: Its take a lot of time to log in my acc. Then couple of minutes to load all the pictures on home screen all is supper slow ! i must wait a lot of to see my profile, colection, store and loot. I cant start game normal i ACCEPT on match and freeze... i wait 30 sec and i see the map but i cant pick champ. Then pull me out of room and i have to wait 5 mins before i play again cuz i cant pick champ... This is not only on me. My friends have this issue too. Please HELP ME ! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
If it's taking a lot of time to load things, but they still load in the end, that's a sign you're lagging. There are usually two reasons for that; either your connection is having trouble, or your computer is having trouble processing a lot of things in the client at once (like animations, for example). The first step I'd like you to try is opening settings and enabling 'Low Specs Mode' to see if that helps with the speeds. If it doesn't, you should also try troubleshooting connection with [**this guide**](http://riot.com/12B7oac) over here. Following those steps will ensure that your connection speeds are up to par. 

If neither of those help out though, get back to me and I can see if there are other things to try, or I can get you some more in depth help in a ticket. :)
